name: Joy'sticking around (Elia)
description:
Joysticking is a mini-games set for all the family. All of the mini-games go on in Joy City that joins very good our idea of making a colorful and funny world with crazy characters as Mr.Pollo.
                The game it is thought to be played by two players who have to share the same controller. So you can see the face of the person you’re beaten up or, if it’s a cooperative game, you can stand side by side. That’s one of the best thing of our game! Another good thing, which definitely makes the difference, is that the mechanics are very easy to get because you just have to use one joystick. And once that you get it you can concentrate in be the fastest
